I mean what I say and say what I mean

Pay is good, advancement is great

Opportunity unlimited and treatment is fair

This Air Force is supposed to be good for me 
And so I went downtown to see

A whole lot of big words I couldn't read

My knees got shaky; I began to sweat

Up walked the postman and dropped the bomb 
He handed me my letter from the Pentagon

Drinking beer at a quarter to three

She's just one big thrill
 the best in the land.
 She's an F-16
 in the Air Combat Command.

And when I got in her
 I knew she was good.
 I rolled her over on her side
 Then on her back I also tried.

I've seen her stripped.
 I've seen her bare,
 I've felt her over everywhere.
 I handled her just as gentle as I could.

She looks so pretty.
 So sleek, so slim.
 The moon is bright
 the lights are dim.

Irene's her name
 She's one of the best.
 So every night
 I give her the test.
